name: Tilt
headline: Bringing the joy of cycling to millions of Indians
description:
You can buy or share our bicycles and e-bikes for health, fitness, and mobility.

Today, our bikes can be found in hundreds of communities across Bangalore, Mumbai, Delhi NCR and Pune.
markdown:

# Shared bicycles for residential campuses
Get our fleet of shared bicycles in your campus.
Build a healthy community. Make mobility easy.
[Get the app](https://tilt.bike/</download>)[Refer your campus →](https://tilt.bike/</sales>)
Backed by
![Logo of Y Combinator](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fyc-logo.4176c562.svg&w=384&q=75)
## Trusted by India's largest organizations
![Logo of Lodha Group](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flodha-logo.2eb46e71.png&w=384&q=75)![Logo of Mahindra Lifespaces](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fmahindra-lifespaces-logo.b5bd8afd.png&w=384&q=75)![Logo of Paranjape](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fparanjape-logo.7899c913.png&w=384&q=75)![Logo of Kolte Patil](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fkolte-patil-logo.e2b4d5f5.png&w=384&q=75)![Logo of Pride Group](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fpride-group-logo.572578db.png&w=256&q=75)![Logo of Salarpuria Sattva](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fsalarpuria-sattva-logo.93ad9fc3.png&w=384&q=75)![Logo of Ozone Group](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fozone-group-logo.772ecc60.png&w=384&q=75)![Logo of Tata Steel](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ftata-steel-logo.057198eb.png&w=384&q=75)
![Healthy communities](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fimg-healthy-communities.f3de631c.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
## Creating healthy communities
Join dozens of residential campuses who are making their communities healthier with Tilt.
[Refer your campus →](https://tilt.bike/</sales>)
## Shared bicycles for multiple needs
Mobility, fitness, or fun. We've got you covered. Track rides, burn calories and earn rewards.
![Multiple needs](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fimg-multiple-needs.f9300b65.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
![Friends & family](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fimg-friends-family.ea17cb91.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
## Connect with friends and family
Achieve your health goals along with the people you are closest to.
## Experience pure nostalgia
Experience the unforgettable moment when you mastered that subtle balancing act.
![Nostalgia](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fimg-nostalgia.736ded8c.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
[![Logo of YourStory](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fyourstory-logo-colour.9622acd8.png&w=1080&q=75)](https://tilt.bike/<https:/yourstory.com/2019/09/startup-tilt-bike-sharing-mobility-electric-vehicles-tcs-incubator>)[![Logo of Autocar Professional](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fautocar-pro-logo-colour.7c31e48b.png&w=1080&q=75)](https://tilt.bike/<https:/www.autocarpro.in/feature/%E2%80%98the-future-is-shared-mobility--rather-than-a-vehicle%E2%80%99s-ability%E2%80%99-deepak-vs-43006>)[![Logo of The Times of India](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ftoi-logo-colour.19785516.png&w=750&q=75)](https://tilt.bike/<https:/timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/jamshedpur/app-based-bicycle-rental-now-in-steel-city-park-zoo/articleshow/67200086.cms>)[![Logo of The Telegraph](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fthe-telegraph-logo-colour.a0335b54.png&w=1080&q=75)](https://tilt.bike/<https:/www.telegraphindia.com/states/jharkhand/thumbs-up-to-smart-cycles-in-jamshedpur/cid/1681048>)
[See all of our press mentions →](https://tilt.bike/</press>)
> ![Logo of Lodha Group](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flodha-logo.2eb46e71.png&w=384&q=75)
> Tilt has revolutionized how Palava commutes. They went live in Feb 2019 with their cycles and e-bikes and we've never had a single complaint since. Thousands of happy residents and rides later, we can't wait to expand further within the city.
> ![Photo of Saunak Basu](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fsaunak-basu.da571049.png&w=1080&q=75)
> Saunak Basu
> Vice President, Lodha Group
> ![Logo of Lodha Group](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ftata-motors-logo.069e9d6a.png&w=384&q=75)
> We have a large campus and we were looking to introduce a bike share service. We were clear that we wanted a docked version of the solution and not a free floating one. Tilt ticked all the boxes for us—on the whole a very positive experience for us.
> ![Photo of Saunak Basu](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fpankaj-jhunjha.902b2f24.png&w=750&q=75)
> Pankaj Jhunjha
> Head of Mobility Services
> ![Logo of Lodha Group](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ftata-steel-logo.057198eb.png&w=384&q=75)
> We collaborated with Tilt to launch bicycle sharing in Jamshedpur. At the Tata Steel Zoo as well as Jubilee Park, the service has been extremely well received. We are now excited to see how this can be scaled to more locations in the city.
> ![Photo of Saunak Basu](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fcapt-d-mishra.596fa535.jpg&w=1920&q=75)
> Office of Capt. D. Mishra
> Sr. General Manager, JUSCO
> ![Logo of Lodha Group](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ftata-motors-logo.069e9d6a.png&w=384&q=75)
> In the Tata Motors Pune campus, we have over 18 kms of motorable roads. Employees who have to travel a lot face several challenges. We partnered with Tilt and fitness has finally taken some stake in the minds of people while they're working.
> ![Photo of Saunak Basu](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fsachin-thakur.f8341d98.png&w=750&q=75)
> Sachin Thakur
> Mobility Services
> ![Logo of Lodha Group](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fnashik-smart-city-logo.8dcb9df6.png&w=256&q=75)
> Nashik Smart City had considered projects that can achieve the goal of making this city the bicycling capital of India. A pilot project was planned and implemented by this young team. The people of Nashik have really enjoyed Tilt.
> ![Photo of Saunak Basu](https://tilt.bike/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fub-powar.acaef359.png&w=1080&q=75)
> U.B. Powar
> Ex-CEO, Nashik Smart City
# Let's bring Tilt to your campus!
We'll help you design a solution that's perfect for your community.
[Refer your campus](https://tilt.bike/</sales>)
Shared bicycles for residential campuses.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Tilt**

Founded in 2016 and a proud participant of the Y Combinator Batch W21, Tilt is on a mission to bring the joy of cycling to millions of Indians. This Bengaluru-based startup aims to enhance health, fitness, and mobility through its innovative bicycle and e-bike sharing system. As of now, Tilt boasts a dedicated team of 12 employees and a prominent presence across major Indian cities like Bangalore, Mumbai, Delhi NCR, and Pune.

**What They Do:**

Tilt offers a range of services, primarily focused on shared bicycles for residential campuses, promoting not just mobility, but a lifestyle centered around health and fitness. Their platform allows users to buy or share bikes and e-bikes easily, making it simple for communities to engage in healthier commuting options. 

Their key offerings include:
- **Shared Bicycle Programs** for residential campuses, which encourages a culture of mobility and wellness.
- **E-Bike Sharing**, meeting various needs—be it for fun, fitness, or commuting.
- **Mobile App Access** for convenience, allowing users to track their rides, burn calories, and earn rewards.

You can check out their website at [Tilt](https://tilt.bike/) for more information.

**Community Impact:**
Tilt has seen considerable traction and trust, collaborating with India's largest organizations, including Tata Steel, Mahindra Lifespaces, and the Lodha Group, which vouch for Tilt’s service quality. They’ve built a community around cycling that not only fosters healthy living but also nurtures social connections by enabling users to ride with friends and family.

**Why Tilt Matters:**
Tilt isn't just about transportation; it's about creating healthier communities. By integrating cycling into everyday life, they address urban mobility challenges while promoting sustainable practices. Their vision places them at the forefront of transforming how Indians perceive and engage with mobility and fitness.

**Join the Movement:**
If you’re part of a residential campus or community looking to enhance mobility, Tilt is ready to design a solution tailored to your needs. Their journey from a startup to a key player in India's cycling landscape is a testament to the growing demand for sustainable and health-conscious travel options. 

Get involved today. Whether you want to buy or share a bike, check out their app, or explore partnership opportunities, Tilt is paving the way for a healthier future!
